ethical_considerations.cultural_respect: Maintain respect for Chinese cultural values while documenting offensive language
ethical_considerations.political_neutrality: Avoid taking sides in political controversies while documenting language use
ethical_considerations.regional_balance: Ensure fair representation of different Chinese regions and political systems
ethical_considerations.privacy_protection: Protect individual privacy when documenting internet language phenomena
ethical_considerations.harm_prevention: Consider potential harm from exposing or amplifying hateful language
